column1: Art Institute of Chicago////As someone who isn't into art too much or know too much about it
column2: I enjoyed some of the interactive modern art and the medieval armory. Also
column3: they have art work and photographs of the revolutionary period that took place in Japan in the 60's and I thought that was incredible to see the struggle that not only too place in the US but around the world. (I'm more of a history facts person).
